alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 10 at 3:04PM ChST until October 10 at 7:15PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Guam, Rota, Tinian and Saipan. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Streams may rise out of their banks. Flash flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Typhoon Bolaven continues to pass through the Marianas. Heavy rain is expected through tonight into Wednesday. Model guidance continues to indicate rainfall potential of 8 to 14 inches, with locally heavier amounts up to 20 inches possible. This would result in extensive flash flooding across the islands. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
